fields.name: Sword of the Occult
fields.description: +10 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive: Grants +5 Attack Damage per stack and 5 stacks upon first purchase. Grants 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist (max 20 stacks). Half of the stacks are lost upon death. At 20 stacks, grants +20% bonus Attack Speed.
